oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry - Prince Albert - 1960-02-20 - Part 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 2 of Prince Albert tobacco sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment from February 20, 1960. Featuring Grant Turner (announcer), Ferlin Husky (host/performer), guest performer Jimmy C. Newman, and regular performers the Jordanaires, Archie Campbell, Tommy Jackson, Chet Atkins, Minnie Pearl, and Grandpa Jones with Ramona Jones. Held at Ryman Auditorium, Nashville, TN. It is announced that this is the 1063rd broadcast.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Minnie Pearl; Archie Campbell; Ferlin Husky; Jimmy C. Newman; Jordanaires; Grandpa Jones; Ramona Jones
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Ferlin Husky introduces Minnie Pearl -- Comedy routine (Minnie Pearl, Archie Campbell) -- The Proof Is In The Puffing (Ferlin Husky) (recording) -- Grant Turner introduces Jimmy Newman -- End Of The Line (Jimmy C. Newman, Jordanaires) -- Ferlin Husky introduces Grandpa Jones -- Old Rattler's Pup (Grandpa Jones, Ramona Jones) -- Grant Turner and Ferlin Husky announce his tour schedule -- My Love For You (Ferlin Husky) -- Closing theme -- Closing statement (Ferlin Husky) -- Camel Cigarettes jingle -- Network announcements (Grant Turner)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); National Broadcasting Company; Grand ole opry (Radio program); Ryman Auditorium (Nashville, Tenn.); United States. Armed Forces Radio Service; Turner, Grant; Smathers, Ben, -1990; Stoney Mountain Cloggers; Jordanaires (Musical group); Atkins, Chet; Jones, Grandpa, 1913-1998; Jones, Ramona; Jackson, Tommy; Campbell, Archie; Minnie Pearl; Husky, Ferlin; Newman, Jimmy C.
